price: И никако се не приближавајте блуду. Заиста је блуд разврат, и ружан пут!
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
